definition: mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
incantation/magic spell/curse/malediction/to revile/to put a curse on sb

sentences.english: Do you have a lucky charm?
It is impossible to charm away the whooping-cough.
sentences.chinese: 用符咒驅除百日咳是不可能的。

sentences.english: Once you have these you can go on to evocation rituals, talismans , and invocations.
sentences.chinese: 當你有這些，你可以先談招魂儀式，符咒，祈禱。

sentences.english: The charlatan boasted that he could charm off any disease.
sentences.chinese: 這個江湖騙子吹牛說他能用符咒治好各種疾病。

sentences.english: I need to find a way to break the spell and win back my money.
sentences.chinese: 我得找到破解符咒的方法，把我的錢贏回來。

sentences.english: She looked at the gold charm bracelet I always wore.
sentences.chinese: 她看着我不曾離手的鐲子，上面有一些符咒。

sentences.english: My parents gave me a new charm every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年我的父母都會給我新的符咒以便更換。

sentences.english: And, by the incantation of this verse.
sentences.chinese: 請憑藉我這韻文寫就的符咒。

sentences.english: For example, the player could recite a spell that triggers some event.
sentences.chinese: 例如，玩家可以背出一段符咒來觸發什麼事件。

sentences.english: It seemed as if he had a charmed life.
There was a custom of assigning various saints with a specific gem for use in talismans .
sentences.chinese: 有一個分配的符咒爲使用特定的寶石各種聖人的習俗。

sentences.english: And who exactly gave you that spell?
sentences.chinese: 到底是誰給你的那個符咒呢？

sentences.english: Luckily, a very simple charm exists to repel a boggart .
sentences.chinese: 幸運的是，有一個非常簡單的符咒就能驅逐幻形怪。

definition: (Taoism) talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers
records/book/Taoist written charm/book of prophecy (e.g. of dynastic fortunes)
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
to chant a magic spell/to recite incantations
to bid farewell/tricks of the trade/pithy mnemonic formula (e.g. Mao Zedong's 16-character mantra 十六字訣|十六字诀 on guerrilla warfare)
to implement the law/to perform sorcery
five chief demons of folklore personifying pestilence/also written 五瘟神
